summary: This is a brief email correspondence dated August 15, 2019, regarding an update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psych observation status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It indicates his status was changed to 'None' shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email regarding his suicide watch and psych observation status while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein Suicide Watch Update
events.description: An email update indicates Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psych observation status was changed to 'None'.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 15, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status.
It indicates Epstein's suicide watch and psych observation status was updated to 'None'.

This status change occurred just days before Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019 (note: the email date is after the death date, suggesting a possible date discrepancy or post-mortem administrative note).
